title: Organic acid type in kimchi is a key factor for determining kimchi starters for kimchi fermentation control
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Jin Yong Kang, Moeun Lee, Jung Hee Song, Eun Ji Choi, So Yeong Mun, Daun Kim, Seul Ki Lim, Namhee Kim, Bo Yeon Park, Ji Yoon Chang
